request_line_manager.text: Please enter the line manager email Id

await_response.text: Please wait while I retrieve the information

training_completed.text: We have noticed that you've completed your training. Would you like to fill the user detail for the account creation

training_inprogress.text: I am unable to process your request as the training has not been completed.

api_issue.text: I am unable to process your request right now. Please try again later.

approval_inprogress.text: The Esign request has not been approved, please wait until the request is approved. You can continue your request later by typing 'Open Requests'.

create_user.text: We have created the user. You will get an email with the credentials.

training_information.text:
Please finish the following Training in HR4U to get access to the application
â€¢ DEV0401
Once you have completed your training, you can continue the request by typing "Open Requests"

initiate_esign.text: We have triggered the esign workflow once approved we will create the user. You can continue your request by typing "Open Requests".

no_open_request.text: Hi, I don't see any request raised against your email Id. You can start by type 'Access Request'.

open_request.text: Hi, I can see that you have initiated the application access request. Have you completed the training or has you esign request been approved.

template_triggered.text: We have triggered the esign workflow once approved we will create the user. You can continue your request by typing "Open Requests".

api_failure.text: The system is down, please try again after some time
